post:
[PremiumVM](http://www.premiumvm.com) is back with more great offers. Some providers call their services "unmanaged" and then don't give you any support at all. We advertise "basic" management - this means that your services aren't fully managed, however we won't leave you in the dark. We will help you. We have more great deals to come, but this one won't last long so grab one before stock runs out.

Today, we'd like to present to you a 4GB RAM package at $7/mo and a 2GB RAM package at $4/mo. We'd like to post another offer located in our new Coventry, UK location.

Location: Phoenix, AZ<br>
Test IP: 192.198.199.194<br>
Test File: http://192.198.199.194/100mb.test

Location: Atlanta, GA<br>
Test IP: 192.3.17.66<br>
Test File: http://192.3.17.66/100mb.test

TOS: http://premiumvm.com/terms.html

<pre><strong>4GB @ $7</strong>

30GB Disk Space
350GB Bandwidth
4GB RAM
4.5GB Burstable RAM (or 512MB vSwap)
4 CPU Cores
OpenVZ Virtualization
Choice of Linux OS's
1 IP Address (more available upon request - $2/mo/IP)
Basic Management
 
$7.00/month - <a href="https://premiumvm.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=39">Order Now</a></pre>

<pre><strong>2GB @ $4</strong>

30GB Disk Space
400GB Bandwidth
2GB RAM
2.5GB Burstable RAM (or 512MB vSwap)
4 CPU Cores
OpenVZ Virtualization
Choice of Linux OS's
1 IP Address (more available upon request - $2/mo/IP)
Basic Management

$4.00/month - <a href="https://premiumvm.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=38">Order Now</a></pre>

<pre><strong>128MB @ $1.25</strong>

10GB Disk Space
350GB Bandwidth
128MB RAM
256MB Burstable RAM (or 512MB vSwap)
4 CPU Cores
OpenVZ Virtualization
Choice of Linux OS's
1 IP Address (more available upon request - $2/mo/IP)
Basic Management

$7.50 semi annually, $15 annually - <a href="https://premiumvm.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=13">Order Now</a></pre>

**Other useful information:**

All packages are upgradable, submit a ticket for pricing. We also offer custom packages, contact us for details.

Submit a ticket: https://premiumvm.kayako.com/Tickets/Submit

Orders will be provisioned with vSwap. This can be changed to Burstable RAM upon request.

All orders are subject to multiple fraud checks. If you pass the fraud checks, your order will be activated within 24 business hours (although usually much sooner).

Let us know if you have any questions. We're here to help!

Thanks for looking.
